    Core Class for Permission System
    Author:
    Daniel Schmid

    • Method Detail

      • check

        public static boolean check(MessageReceivedEvent event,
                            java.lang.String permissionName)
        tests if the who executed the Command is permitted to execute it if forbidden an errormessage will be sent.
        Parameters:
        event - the MessageReceivedEvent of the Command-Message
        permissionName - the name of the permission to test
        Returns:
        true if access else false

      • check

        public static boolean check(MessageReceivedEvent event,
                            java.lang.String permissionName,
                            boolean doErrMsg)
        tests if the who executed the Command is permitted to execute it if forbidden and doErrMsg is true an errormessage will be sent.
        Parameters:
        event - the MessageReceivedEvent of the Command-Message
        permissionName - the name of the permission to test
        doErrMsg - should an error Message be sent if the user is not permitted?
        Returns:
        true if access else false

      • checkOwner

        public static boolean checkOwner(MessageReceivedEvent event)
        tests if the Author of a Message is the Developer of this Bot
        if not an errormessage will be sent.
        Parameters:
        event - the MessageReceivedEvent of the Message
        Returns:
        true if the Author is the Developer, else false

      • checkOwner

        public static boolean checkOwner(MessageReceivedEvent event,
                                 boolean doErrMsg)
        tests if the Author of a Message is the Developer of this Bot
        if forbidden and doErrMsg is true an errormessage will be sent.
        Parameters:
        event - the MessageReceivedEvent of the Message
        doErrMsg - should an Error-Message be sent?
        Returns:
        true if the Author is the Developer, else false

      • getPerm

        public static java.lang.String[] getPerm(Guild g,
                                         java.lang.String permName)
        gets guild-local Permission info using a specified permission name
        Parameters:
        g - The Guild from the Permission
        permName - The name of the Permission
        Returns:
        A String[] of the Role names which have the Permission

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        permName - The name of the Permission which should be deleted
        Returns:

        Parameters:

        newRole - The name of the Role to Replace with

        Parameters:

        permName - The Name of the Permission
        perm - The names of the Roles who should have the Permission

      • getRoleFromName

        public static java.lang.String getRoleFromName(java.lang.String name,
                                               Guild g)
        get the ISnowflake Id from a role name or null if the Role doesn't exist
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Role
        g - the Guild the Role is in
        Returns:
        the id of the role or null

      • getRolesFromNames

                                                   Guild g)
        get the ISnowflake Ids from an Array of role names
        Parameters:
        names - the Array of role names
        g - the Guild the Roles are in
        Returns:
        the ids of the roles represented by a String array
